channel.title: NEED HELP WITH SIMPLE PROBLEM ON 508 SERVER Part 2
channel.description:
ok on my 508 when you log in on the login screen it says te source instead of my server name...
how do i change that...it is ip based so there is NO client.java
it uses codeusa...
please help me

item.title: NEED HELP WITH SIMPLE PROBLEM ON 508 SERVER Part 2
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Lol your welcome. ^^" I try.

Made-up free quote for siggiez (Spontaneous work…):

Epic Ancient:

Bet you didn’t know I can be classified as the “Help Section Stalker”. I’m nearly here from the time I wake up, to the time I go to sleep. Nearly. --I know you want to quote this noob, so go ahead! :]

item.title: NEED HELP WITH SIMPLE PROBLEM ON 508 SERVER Part 2
item.dc:creator: @weezyfbaby weezyfbaby
item.description:
@weezyfbaby wrote:

ok thanks epic, but i wasnt trying to be smart im just admitting to my lack of knowledge with

servers now, i know i dont know anything thats why im trying to learn it, but thanks for all the

help…

but 1 last thing…

how do i chang the login screen to say my server name instead of the source

Read full topic
item.source: NEED HELP WITH SIMPLE PROBLEM ON 508 SERVER Part 2

item.title: NEED HELP WITH SIMPLE PROBLEM ON 508 SERVER Part 2
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“weezyfbaby, post:5, topic:300573”]Im not familiar with EGUI.java

im sorry bt i havent done coding in like 1 year so there is alot im missing…

and i have done the port forwarding and stuff, but like how do i know that they can you my ip

as in *********.no-ip.org[/quote]

Offtopic: Ever notice how Junior Members/Members always say

soz but i havenot coded in like a year and stuff so…
They say that to act smart (no offense weezy), when they really don’t know much about coding, if anything at all. :\

(Not being mean, but you can’t deny that this happens. >.>)
Ontopic: If you port forwarded, run your no-ip DUC and your server, and they should be able to connect. :x

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP WITH SIMPLE PROBLEM ON 508 SERVER Part 2
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“weezyfbaby, post:3, topic:300573”]ok, mines doesnt have a client.java

its the bin, src, build usng codeusa…

so that means its ip based?

and how do i put it so ppl can log on it using my server ip?[/quote]
Port forward.
If you mean set it up so it uses your IP, then, make it use YOUR IP by changing it from localhost to whatever your IP is in EGUI.java.
If I’m wrong, someone correct me. Haven’t made IP changes in quite some time.

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP WITH SIMPLE PROBLEM ON 508 SERVER Part 2
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

If it has client.java, then it’s client based.
In client.java, search for the welcome message
You can change it to whatever.

Read full topic
